original_title: Sri Lanka rupee opens at 328.40/50 to US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee opened at 328.40/50 to the US dollar on Wednesday, from 328.60/75 a day before, dealers said.
The Colombo All Share Index opened up 0.10 percent, or 10.47 points, at 10,518. The S&P SL20 index of liquid stocks was up 0.10 percent, or 2.92 points at 2,975.
A bond maturing on 01.08.2026 was quoted at 14.40/55 percent from 14.55/65 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2028 was quoted at 14.50/60 percent from 14.65/75 percent. (Colombo/Nov22/2023)
